subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Marcus Paige scored all 13 of his points in the second half for host North Carolina, which rallied from an 11-point deficit to beat No. 5 Duke in a weather-delayed game.
snippet: Marcus Paige scored all 13 of his points in the second half for host North Carolina, which rallied from an 11-point deficit to beat No. 5 Duke in a weather-delayed game.
